sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ActorGallery></ActorGallery>
</template>

<script>
import {EventBus} from "@/main";

export default {
  name: "AdminPanel",
  data: () => ({
    isAdmin: true
  }),
  created() {
    this.checkAdmin();

  },
  methods: {
    async checkAdmin(){
      this.axios
          .get(`/admin/check`)
          .then( res => {
            if (!res.data.admin) this.$router.push(`/`)
          })
          .catch( e => {
            console.log("no es admin")
            EventBus.$emit('alert',{
              color: 'red',
              type: 'error',
              msg: e.response.data.message
            });
            this.$router.push(`/`);
          })

    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
